scripts.fetch-types: mkdir -p types && curl ${SERVER_HOST:-https://softagen.com}/api/types/v0.1.0/aiwebengine.d.ts -o types/aiwebengine.d.ts && curl ${SERVER_HOST:-https://softagen.com}/api/types/v0.1.0/aiwebengine-priv.d.ts -o types/aiwebengine-priv.d.ts && echo '✓ Type definitions updated'
scripts.fetch-openapi: mkdir -p apis && curl ${SERVER_HOST:-https://softagen.com}/engine/openapi.json -o apis/openapi.json && echo '✓ OpenAPI description downloaded to apis/openapi.json'
scripts.fetch-graphql-schema: mkdir -p schemas && node scripts/fetch-graphql-schema.js && echo '✓ GraphQL schema downloaded to schemas/schema.json'
scripts.upload-docs: node scripts/upload-script.js --script-path src/docs/docs.js --script-uri https://example.com/docs --assets-dir src/docs/assets --asset-prefix docs/
scripts.upload-docs-dry-run: node scripts/upload-script.js --script-path src/docs/docs.js --script-uri https://example.com/docs --assets-dir src/docs/assets --asset-prefix docs/ --dry-run
scripts.outdated: npm outdated || echo '✓ Checked for outdated packages'
scripts.lint: markdownlint "**/*.md" --ignore node_modules && echo '✓ Markdown files linted'
scripts.all: npm run fetch-types && npm run fetch-openapi && npm run fetch-graphql-schema && npm run format
